description: Mages have devoted their lives to the study and practice of the mystique. An experienced mage can be a deadly force to reckon with.
name: Glacian Mage #97

description: A seer of Avarik who chooses to hide her mysterious powers for herself, born out of sacred unions of spirits.

description: A Wizard’s frenzied dabbles in the supernatural grants her power that transcends the rules of the universe.

description: A seasoned warrior and assassin of the land, the stealthy Marksman is rarely noticed, until his target falls.
